title: Bread is life
brief_description: The story of the Bread Research Institute of the CSIRO and what it does including: analysing flour samples and experimenting with proportion of gluten in the flour mix; experimenting with machines for making bread; methods of storing flour; analysing faulty loaves and offering advice to improve quality.
